name: 亨利小上帝
summary: 一个名为Henry James Hermin的男孩，他相信自己的生命，是源于一个左派女权主义者创造出来的试管婴儿。于是在他十岁时，他认为他的母亲并不足够爱他，于是开始去寻找自己的生父…… At the age of ten, Henry James Hermin, a boy who was conceived in a petri-dish and raised by his feminist mother, follows a string of Post-It notes in hopes of finding his biological father.
